Le Temp 的原文在此： https://www.letemps.ch/opinions/coronavirus-loms-avait-ecoute-taiwan

即使是要靠GOOGLE翻譯成英文，即使祇能讀到前兩段，也好高興看到這樣的文章。現在特別想讀全文。
Are we doing better with SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus without WHO? Taiwan's experience in fighting the Covid-19 may suggest this. The island with which the international organization has cut almost all contact since 2016 under pressure from Beijing is one of the areas least affected by the pandemic, with around a hundred confirmed cases and one death. The Taiwanese economy is however intertwined with that of China and hundreds of thousands of Taiwanese work on the continent. So how did they avoid the worst?


As of December 31, three weeks before the Chinese authorities and those of the WHO following them give the alert of a human transmission of a new coronavirus, Taiwan is the first state to take action. Why? Because in Taipei, unlike Beijing, we listen to the whistleblowers of Wuhan. [...]



"沒有WHO，是不是對抗擊疫情比較好？"

"在臺北，和北京不同，我們聼了武漢吹哨人。"
